citeinfo.origin: Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Science Branch - Data Analyst
citeinfo.title: Aboriginal Catch Database (Canada)

descript.abstract:
Parameter Catch data are collected for different Aboriginal groups in B.C. and the Yukon. Gear type, exact fishing location, and fishing period are collected whenever possible.
Measurement Details For aboriginal fisheries with pilot sales agreements, band administered catch monitoring programs are in place. Band members must land at designated landing sites and have their catch counted by monitors. A landing record is completed for each landing during a fishing period.
Geographic Area British Columbia and Yukon
Other Comments Data have not been collected in a consistent manner over the years or for all areas.
[ A TCODE project ]

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
